defmodule Blockytalky.UserCode do
  use Blockytalky.DSL
repeatedly do
   serial_wrap("on",255)
  set(:light , get_sensor_value(:A1)
  )
  set(:temp , gp_get_temp(:D2)
  )
  send_val(get(:light))

end

end
